query: How much did Microsoft's cloud revenue grow from 2022 to 2023?
answer: Microsoft Cloud (formerly commercial cloud) revenue increased 32% to $91.2 billion. Office Commercial products and cloud services revenue increased 13% driven by Office 365 Commercial growth of 18%. Revenue increased $13.6 billion or 7% in fiscal year 2023.
reasoning: Used agent decomposition with 2 sub-queries and hf LLM for synthesis.
